Alex Manrique

Senior Java developer

Resume

About Me

Software engineer fascinated by software development. I have been working basically in the e-commerce sector. Currently working in the leading Online travel agency in Europe, eDreams-Odigeo, I have a deep knowledge in the travel sector, where millions of customers interact with our systems in a daily basis. In the past I worked also in a security software company that provide solutions for the spanish administration and also in the banking sector where a huge number of customers need to interact with banking on-line services and where security is one of the main requirements. Design, develop, and implement web-based applications to support business requirements. Follow approved life cycle methodologies, create design documents, and perform program coding and testing. Resolve technical issues through debugging, research, and investigation. Focused mainly in delivering clean code, loosely coupled and easy-to-scale solutions.

Experience

eDreams Odigeo

Senior Software engineer - February 2012 - Current

OdigeO is the biggest online travel agency in Europe and the fifth worldwide, operating from Barcelona. The online travel group was formed in 2011 with the merge of eDreams, GO Voyages, Opodo and Travellink. Currently operating in 38 countries, with 1,200 employees and over 15M annual customers. As a member of Marketing development team I'm responsible of delivering technical designs and developing code for this new projects. Building applications that are used by a high number of users. Scalability, performance and usability are key technical requirements. Using best practices in software engineering to deliver clean and well maintained code..
